Package aco

Class AntColonyClass

java.lang.Object
aco.AntColonyClass
All Implemented Interfaces:
AntColony
public class AntColonyClass extends Object implements AntColony
Represents a colony of Ants.

      The constructor.
      Parameters:
      nest - The nest node.
      alphaMoveEvt - Alpha, ant move event.
      betaMoveEvt - Beta, ant move event.
      deltaMoveEvt - Delta, ant move event.
      pheromoneEvapEvtEta - Eta, pheromone evaporation event.
      pheromoneEvapEvtRo - Ro, pheromone evaporation event.
      pheromoneLevel - Pheromone level.
      graphWeight - The total weight of the graph.
      graphSize - The total number of nodes in the graph.
